head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SECHE, MARGARET M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SECHE, MARGARET M.

block.p: SECHE-Margaret M. Entered into eternal rest on Friday, May 12th. Beloved wife of the late Norman E. Seche. Loving mother of Laura A. Seche. Dear cousin of Dolores Murry, Robert Wood, and Frances Sullivan. The family will receive their relatives and friends Tuesday, May 16th from 2-4 and 7-9 PM at Feeney Funeral Home, 232 Franklin Ave, Ridgewood (201444-7650). A Funeral Mass will be celebrated 9:30 AM Wednesday, May 17th at Nativity Church in Midland Park, NJ. Interment to follow at St. Luke's Cemetery in HoHo-Kus, NJ. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to the American Heart Association.
